body:
Hello,

since this evening, after I have send 30 Whatsapp Messages at once, Whatsapp send me the following Exception:

Fatal error: Uncaught exception 'Exception' with message 'Login Failure' in xxx\whatsapi\whatsprot.class.php:1618 Stack trace: #0 xxx\whatsapi\whatsprot.class.php(465): WhatsProt->doLogin() #1 WhatsProt->loginWithPassword('xxx.') #2 {main} thrown in xxxx\whatsapi\whatsprot.class.php on line 1618

Get I this Error becouse I have send over 30 Messages or because Whastapp get last Week an update? 1 Month ago i tested it with around 120 Messages and it still worked?!

Does anyone know why I get this Exception?

comment_data.body: @Waishon At first sight, it seems that WhatsApp banned you. Set debug to TRUE and if you see not authorized, means that WA banned you.

Yes I have set Debug to TRUE but I get only this Exception.
But why ban Whatsapp people and can I unban me?

@Waishon if you get something like this:

```
rx  <failure>
rx    <not-authorized></not-authorized>
rx  </failure>
```
You are banned. If you are not getting that, maybe your password is wrong. There is no way to unban.

@mgp25 
So here is the Debug:

tx  <stream:features></stream:features>

tx  <auth xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-sasl" mechanism="WAUTH-2" user="xxxxxx"></auth>

rx  <start from="s.whatsapp.net"></start>

rx  <stream:features></stream:features>

rx  <challenge>cõA,ey6Ha',¢nÜ¿t</challenge>

tx  <response xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-sasl">|îau@r”Z›É°Âkœ¯J.PÝmâž±¸™`Èq9RG</response>

I think I´m not banned, but why changed the password at once?
@Waishon thats all the debug you got? Be sure your password is right..

Yes the password is right and this is all of debug + the Login Failed Exception.
I will request a news Password with WART, but I must find my Sim Card :D

It works yesterday evening but suddenly not any more

Now I get this, but few minutes ago not.
rx  <failure>
rx    <not-authorized></not-authorized>
rx  </failure>

So i must buy a new Sim Card, right? But how can I send about 50 Messages at once?

EDIT://Now i doesn´t get it :) Its very strange and after a few minutes i get it again

EDIT2://  [status] => fail [reason] => blocked... ;(
If I use the broadcast function, get i also blocked?

@Waishon you will always get blocked if you send  massive messages to unkown and unsynced numbers.

The best thing you could do, is to simulate and do the same things WhatsApp mobile client do.

@Waishon
This are about 50 Messages. If i said them,they should import this number in their Contact List, did it work then?
Or can I create a group and send the Message to the group? But how can I get the JID of the Group?

title: Login Failure
